articles.title: Lucid Air named car of the year by Motor Trend - Fox News
articles.description: The electric Lucid Air has been picked by Motor Trend as its 2022 car of the year. The American-made sedan can cover 520 miles per charge and has prices ranging from $77,400 to $169,000.
articles.content:
